# <code>roll up</code> for filters

<div class='command-title'>Roll table rows up</div>

## Signature

```> roll up {flags}```

## Flags

 * ```-h, --help```: Display this help message
 * ```-b, --by <Int>```: Number of rows to roll
## Examples

  Rolls rows up
```shell
  > [[a b]; [1 2] [3 4] [5 6]] | roll up
```
